title: Cristian Vlad
text:
Cristian Nicolae Vlad (born 18 February 1977 in <a href="Bolde%C8%99ti-Sc%C4%83eni">Boldești-Scăeni</a>, <a href="Prahova%20County">Prahova County</a>) is a retired <a href="Romania">Romania</a>n <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> player. He played as a <a href="Midfielder%20%28association%20football%29">midfielder</a>.
Club career.
He made his debut in the <a href="Divizia%20A">Divizia A</a> at 20 years old for <a href="Petrolul%20Ploie%C8%99ti">Petrolul Ploiești</a> where he played until the 1999/2000 season.
His next destination was <a href="Dinamo%20Bucure%C8%99ti">Dinamo București</a> where he did not make a great impact.
In 2007, he returned to <a href="Petrolul%20Ploie%C8%99ti">Petrolul Ploiești</a> where he helped the team until his retirement in 2011.
